member.name: M:DataStructures.QuadTree.Subdivide
member.summary: Create the quads as four quadtrees that are equally subdivided in reference to this quad.

member.name: M:DataStructures.QuadTree.Insert(DataStructures.Node)
member.summary: Add a node to the quadtree
member.param: A Node to add to the quadtree
member.returns: True if the insertion was successful.

member.name: M:DataStructures.QuadTree.Delete(DataStructures.Node)
member.summary: Removes the first node from the quad tree at the position passed.
member.returns: A true indicates a node was successfully removed.

member.name: M:DataStructures.QuadTree.QueryBounds(Duality.Rect)
member.summary: Find all points within an axis aligned bounding box.
member.param: An rectangle used to find all points in the quadtree.
member.returns: A list of nodes representing all positions within the Rect passed.
